import React, {Component} from 'react' import ToyslandService from '../../services/ToyslandService' import { WithAuthConsumer } from '../context/AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class SingleProduct extends Component { state = { product: {}, user: {} } componentDidMount() { ToyslandService.getThisProduct(this.props.match.params.id) .then(product => { this.setState({product}) }) } render() { return(
{this.state.product.name}
{this.state.product.category}
{this.state.product.user.name}
{this.state.product.user.id}
Chat
{this.state.product.price}â‚¬
{this.state.product.name}
{this.state.product.description}
{this.state.product.createdAt}
) } } export default WithAuthConsumer (SingleProduct)
